trans-unit.source: Adds a <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.TableOperation</codeEntityReference> to the <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.TableBatchOperation</codeEntityReference> that retrieves an entity with the specified partition key and row key.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the row key of the entity to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: A string containing the row key of the entity to retrieve.
